name: A Symbiotic Relationship
description:
Graduation is a stressful time in any symbionts life. On top of exams, football games, and proms, it's also time to pick who you'll be bonded with for life!

Love doesn't always work out like it does in the movies though, and you're going to need to dig deep to find happiness. Good luck!

(while this game contains frank discussion of sexual topics, it does not contain any sexually explicit scenes. Still, audience discretion is advised)
